mapper.select: select max(cast(substring_index(unity_code, '_', -1) as unsigned)) from _ringo_unity where unity_code like 'unt_%'
mapper.insert: insert into _ringo_unity ( unity_code, unity_name, unity_admin, unity_topic, unity_lang, unity_location, unity_tag, unity_intro, unity_method, unity_private, unity_thumbnail_path, unity_banner_set, unity_banner_path ) values ( #{unity_code}, #{unity_name}, #{unity_admin}, #{unity_topic}, #{unity_lang}, #{unity_location}, #{unity_tag}, #{unity_intro}, #{unity_method}, #{unity_private}, #{unity_thumbnail_path}, #{unity_banner_set}, #{unity_banner_path} )
mapper.select:
select unt.unity_code, unt.unity_name, unt.unity_admin, unt.unity_tag, unt.unity_intro, unt.unity_method, unt.unity_topic, unt.unity_lang, unt.unity_location, unt.unity_private, unt.unity_thumbnail_path, unt.unity_since, unt.unity_grade, unt.unity_member_count, ub.unity_board_code, ub.unity_board_category, ub.unity_board_name
from _ringo_unity unt left join _ringo_unity_board ub on unt.unity_code = ub.unity_code where unt.unity_code = #{unity_code} order by unity_board_code asc

(select post_code, post_place, post_place_name, post_writer, post_recomm_count, post_reple_count, post_title, post_time, writer_thumbnail_path, writer_nickname, 'hot_post' as post_type from uPost where substring_index(post_place, '_', 2) = #{unity_code} and post_time >= now() - interval 3 day )
union all
(select post_code, post_place, post_place_name, post_writer, post_recomm_count, post_reple_count, post_title, post_time, writer_thumbnail_path, writer_nickname, 'recent_post' as post_type from uPost where substring_index(post_place, '_', 2) = #{unity_code} )
order by (post_reple_count + post_recomm_count) desc, post_time desc

select u.user_code, u.user_nickname, u.user_logon, um.unity_member_visit_times, um.unity_member_write_count, um.unity_member_reple_count, um.unity_member_grade, um.unity_member_since, unt.unity_banner_path, unt.unity_banner_set from _ringo_user u left join _ringo_unity_member um on um.unity_code = #{unity_code} and um.user_code = u.user_code left join _ringo_unity unt on unt.unity_code = #{unity_code} where u.user_code = #{user_code}

select unity_board_code, unity_board_category, unity_board_name, concat('[', unity_board_category, '] - ', unity_board_name) as unity_board_fullname from _ringo_unity_board where unity_board_code = #{unity_board_code}
